TestCases.Title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
TestCases.Precondition: User is registered and has valid credentials.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid username.
3. Enter a valid password.
4. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

TestCases.Title: Successful Login with Two-Factor Authentication
TestCases.Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid username.
3. Enter a valid password.
4. Click on the 'Login' button.
5. Enter the correct OTP sent to the registered device.
6. Click on the 'Verify' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

TestCases.Title: Login with Invalid Password
TestCases.Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a valid username.
3. Enter an invalid password.
4. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: Error message is displayed: 'Invalid username or password.'

TestCases.Title: Login with SQL Injection in Username Field
TestCases.Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter an SQL injection string in the username field (e.g., ' OR '1'='1).
3. Enter any password.
4. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: Error message is displayed: 'Invalid username or password.' No SQL injection vulnerability is exploited.

TestCases.Title: Login with Maximum Length Username
TestCases.Precondition: User is registered with a username of maximum allowed length.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a username with maximum allowed characters.
3. Enter a valid password.
4. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

TestCases.Title: Login with Special Characters in Username
TestCases.Precondition: User is registered with a username containing special characters.
TestCases.Steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter a username with special characters.
3. Enter a valid password.
4. Click on the 'Login' button.
TestCases.ExpectedResult: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.
